definitions.definition: Ancient Roman religious festivals celebrated on the March equinox to honor Cybele .
A legendary saint , daughter of the Roman emperor Zeno, who disguised herself as a man to become a monk and later healed her sister of an ailment.

main_definition: ( historical ) Ancient Roman religious festivals celebrated on the March equinox to honor Cybele .
secondary_definitions: ( mythology ) A legendary saint , daughter of the Roman emperor Zeno, who disguised herself as a man to become a monk and later healed her sister of an ailment.
